data.text: @News24 @BISouthAfrica Let's hope it flourishes like Max Lifestyle in Umlazi.....there's is a shortage of decent establishments in the Cape Town townships
@News24 @BISouthAfrica In the midst of poverty and crime really

@KumiKaZi_ @News24 @BISouthAfrica A few can, they are working their way up. If there weren't then this business wouldn't last a month in Khayelitsha. I hope it's at least run and owned by locals (I would guess it is).

@News24 @BISouthAfrica Pravin is going to order his brother in law to find tax dirt on it and shut it down.. Establishment like these are only reserve for the ruling class.. Soon u will be telling us they are dry cleaning money

@News24 @BISouthAfrica Neighbours should consider selling their homes to other potential businesses for a good price. 1stly, I don't think they'll appreciate the noise, and 2ndly, the area cam become a hive of economic activity.
@LANDLORD862 @News24 @BISouthAfrica Lol that place is right next to Rands
